module Network.Riak.Protocol.Content
data Content

instance Eq Content
instance Ord Content
instance Data Content
instance ReflectDescriptor Content
instance GPB Content

instance Wire Content
instance Default Content
instance Mergeable Content

module Network.Riak.Protocol.BucketProps.ReplMode
data ReplMode

instance Read ReplMode
instance Show ReplMode
instance Eq ReplMode
instance Ord ReplMode

module Network.Riak.Protocol.BucketProps
data BucketProps
BucketProps :: !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Bool) -> !(Maybe Bool) -> !(Seq CommitHook) -> !(Maybe Bool) -> !(Seq CommitHook) -> !(Maybe Bool) -> !(Maybe ModFun) -> !(Maybe ModFun) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Word32) -> !(Maybe Bool) -> !(Maybe Bool) -> !(Maybe ByteString) -> !(Maybe Bool) -> !(Maybe ReplMode) -> BucketProps
n_val :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Word32)
allow_mult :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Bool)
last_write_wins :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Bool)

has_precommit :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Bool)
postcommit :: BucketProps -> !(Seq CommitHook)

linkfun :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe ModFun)
old_vclock :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Word32)
young_vclock :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Word32)

small_vclock :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Word32)

pw :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Word32)
dw :: BucketProps -> !(Maybe Word32)

instance Ord BucketProps

module Network.Riak.Protocol.GetBucketResponse
data GetBucketResponse
GetBucketResponse :: !BucketProps -> GetBucketResponse
props :: GetBucketResponse -> !BucketProps
instance Typeable GetBucketResponse
instance Show GetBucketResponse
instance Eq GetBucketResponse
instance Ord GetBucketResponse
instance Data GetBucketResponse
instance ReflectDescriptor GetBucketResponse
instance GPB GetBucketResponse
instance MessageAPI msg' (msg' -> GetBucketResponse) GetBucketResponse
instance Wire GetBucketResponse
instance Default GetBucketResponse
instance Mergeable GetBucketResponse

module Network.Riak.Protocol.SetBucketRequest
data SetBucketRequest
SetBucketRequest :: !ByteString -> !BucketProps -> SetBucketRequest
bucket :: SetBucketRequest -> !ByteString
props :: SetBucketRequest -> !BucketProps
instance Typeable SetBucketRequest
instance Show SetBucketRequest
instance Eq SetBucketRequest
instance Ord SetBucketRequest
instance Data SetBucketRequest
instance ReflectDescriptor SetBucketRequest
instance GPB SetBucketRequest
instance MessageAPI msg' (msg' -> SetBucketRequest) SetBucketRequest
instance Wire SetBucketRequest
instance Default SetBucketRequest
instance Mergeable SetBucketRequest
